=Presentation of Omega Engine=
==Introduction==
Omega engine (or ohmengine), is a little "game engine", based on the Irrlicht 3d engine. It provide a API for make games easly.

==Detailed presentation==

===Features===
ohmengine (when I'm finished my current objective) include a support of graphics (with Irrlicht), a support of audio (with OpenAL), of physics (with the irrBullet wrapper), network, and some other features.

===Why create this engine ?===
First, for my pleasure. Indeed, I love programming and I spend a lot of my free time in that. Second, for learn some tips, use some libraries, and many other things.
